title: Localization key is not being displayed in chart when added with a blank value.
description: If the localization key is left blank when adding, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The localization key is left blank in the properties file while still having a valid value.
EB: When the localization key is left blank in the properties file, but still has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the localization key blank while still having a valid value.
3. Verify that the externalized text is not being displayed in the chart title.
